solution_line_template: In the first field, there are {rows_field1} rows * {cobs_per_row} corn cobs/row = <<{rows_field1}*{cobs_per_row}={cobs_field1}>>{cobs_field1} corn cobs.
In the second field, there are {rows_field2} rows * {cobs_per_row} corn cobs/row = <<{rows_field2}*{cobs_per_row}={cobs_field2}>>{cobs_field2} corn cobs.
So the farm has grown a total of {cobs_field1} corn cobs + {cobs_field2} corn cobs = <<{cobs_field1}+{cobs_field2}={total_cobs}>>{total_cobs} corn cobs.
